Hi ,I am trying to achieve incremental crawling using Heritrix 3.2.0.However it seems it is always browsing all the URL's even if there is no change.I am attaching crawler-beans.xml for the configuration that I am doing.Can anyone suggest what I might be doing wrong ?


Any help will be greatly appreciated as I am desperately tryinjg to get this work :)


ThanksSandip DevKolkata,India
